thread.section_title: Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Huge & Beautiful
thread.title_full: Huge & Beautiful - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Sabrina_M1997
title: Huge & Beautiful
text:
The place is huge enough offering several activities for anyone to spend 2-3 days without even going out anywhere else.
We stayed for two nights over a weekend and enjoyed our stay... The activities like boating, horse riding swimming as well as walking around in their beautifully landscaped gardens, feeding fish in small ponds was really amazing and we didn't really as how fast the we spent two days there.
The place is really beautiful and staff were amazing.
